title: # 13 - Something’s Burning Uncut - Michael Rosenbaum & Harland Williams
description:
Something’s Burning uncut is the uncut audio from my cooking show “Something’s Burning” on YouTube. On this episode that originally aired Nov, 5th 2018. Michael Rosenbaum (Smallville) & Harland Williams join me to make palate cleansing Dole Whip Cocktails and Harland's own recipe for "Lick My Greasy Ass" Sandwiches.

Recipe: http://bit.ly/BurningGreasyRecipe

Subscribe to ATC to never miss an episode of Something’s Burning: http://bit.ly/SubscribeATC

Check out Michael's Podcast "Inside of You" wherever you get your podcasts. 

The Berty Boy Tour is on sale now! Get your tickets at www.bertbertbert.com  For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: www.bertbertbert.com  

Twitter: www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer   Facebook: www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer   Instagram: www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer Youtube: www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
